long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your experience with JSON data in browsers like never before!
Smart JSON is a powerful tool for developers and data enthusiasts. It offers a seamless and intuitive interface to format, fold, and manipulate JSON data directly in your browser.

With just a click, transform cluttered JSON into a beautifully structured and readable format.
Enjoy features like easy copying to clipboard and efficient data folding for better navigation. 

Install Smart JSON and turn your browser into a JSON-handling powerhouse!
